analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol:
	Contract FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#53-56)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection.makePayout (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#73-83) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-company_token.mint(addressOfBountyMembers[i],bountyMembersAmounts[addressOfBountyMembers[i]]) (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#77-83)

FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection.makePayout has external calls inside a loop:
	- company_token.mint(addressOfBountyMembers[i],bountyMembersAmounts[addressOfBountyMembers[i]]) (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#77-83)
Parameter '' of Token.mint (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#12) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_scope_0' of Token.mint (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#12) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_company_token' of FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection. (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#39-40) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newValue' of FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection.setCountPerStep (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#57-60) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of FourthBountyWPTpayoutCorrection.setOwner (/unique_contracts/0x36c6a8126c64b74923a202ffa20dc9fb84afb587.sol#64) is not in mixedCase
